overview: The film is based on the great Russian poet Alexander Pushkin’s poem of the same name.  In the midst of the wedding party of Prince Ruslan and Ludmila, daughter of  Prince Vladimir, the girl is kidnapped by the evil sorcerer Chernomor and the witch Naina.  Three former suitors for her hand set out, as does Ruslan, to rescue Ludmila...
title: Ruslan and Ludmila
